findSql.name: granite.findUDAValueInGraniteByPathName_UDAName
findSql.label: Find UDAValue In Granite By PathName & UDAName

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select {+*+} from circ_path_attr_settings cpas where 1=1 and cpas.circ_path_inst_id = (select circ_path_inst_id from circ_path_inst where 1=1 {[3] and circ_path_hum_id = ?}) and cpas.val_attr_inst_id = (select van.val_attr_inst_id from val_attr_name van where 1=1 {[1] and van.attr_name = ?} {[2] and van.group_name = ?})
